Class AbstractRepository<T extends AbstractUniqueId>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractRepository<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of objects contained in the repository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountRepository, TransactionRepository

    public abstract class AbstractRepository<T extends AbstractUniqueId>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for repository objects. Classes that inherit from AbstractController should specialize the template with the object type it is meant to hold.
